StoryDescriptor: A poll was conducted by a private group in the South Region of the kingdom at one of the busiest marketplaces. Of those who were able to take the survey, almost 80% rated the king equal to or worse than the previous king.
OutcomeDescriptor: There was no proof to this claim but your focus on the issue has caused your ratings to drop according to new reports.
StoryTitle: The kings ratings are at an all-time low
ShortOutcomeDescriptor: There was no proof to this claim but your focus on the issue has caused your ratings to drop according to new reports.
